message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to get your hands on this fantastic item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $140.
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer, but that's a bit too steep for me. Would you consider $110?
Thanks for the offer, Bob! I understand it's a bit above your budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can do $130 for the product. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it!
I appreciate you coming down a bit, Alice. How about we split the difference from our previous offers and settle at $120?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! However, I'm not willing to go all the way down to $120. I can do $125 for the product, and I think it's still a great deal for you. Let me know what you think!
